entity.name: user
entity.query: select u.user_id as id, u.user_name, u.realname, u.title, u.phone, u.email, u.address, u.image, u.people_resume, o.organization_id AS company_id, o.name AS company, dmdii.expire_date as dmdii_expire_date from users u LEFT JOIN organization_user ou ON ou.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN organization o ON o.organization_id = ou.organization_id LEFT JOIN organization_dmdii_member dmdii ON dmdii.organization_id = o.organization_id

entity.name: skills_data
entity.query: select ps.name as skill_keyword FROM users u left join people_skill_inventory psi ON psi.user_id = u.user_id left join people_skill ps ON ps.skill_id = psi.skill_id WHERE u.user_id = '${user.id}'
